import sys

def main():
    a,b = map(int,input().split())
    print((a+b)%24) 

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

import sys

def main():
    a,b = map(int,input().split())
    print((a-b)%24)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


import sys

def main():
    line = sys.stdin.readline()
    a, b = line.split()
    a = int(a)  # convert string to int
    b = int(b)  # convert string to int
    print((a + b) % 24)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
# https://www.acmicpc.net/problem/10951

import sys

def main():
    line = sys.stdin.readline()
    A,B = line.split()
    A = int(A)
    B = int(B)
    print((A+B) % 24)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

import sys

def main():
    a,b = map(int,sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
    print((a+b)%24)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def main():
    line = sys.stdin.readline()
    A, B = line.split()
    A = int(A)  # convert string to int
    B = int(B)  # convert string to int
    print((A + B) % 24)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
